sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/tour-details.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours'; import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg'; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); // static data const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); // destructure properties from tour object const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, address, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); // const const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' }; return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not rated' : ({reviews?.length})} {address}
{city} Rp{price}/person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/* ================= Tour reviews section ================ */}

Reviews({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{reviews?.map((review) => (
jordi

{new Date('06-06-2023').toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

5
Amazing tour
))}
{/* ================= Tour reviews section end ================ */}
); }; export default TourDetails;
